Album

This section has structure for albums and it's list wrapper.

To use album you might create such code:

<div class="album">
    <div class="album_control album_control__left">
        <i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-heart"></i>
    </div>
    <div class="album_control album_control__right">
        <span class="dropdown">
            <span class="dropdown_control"><i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-dots"></i></span>
            <span class="dropdown_list dropdown_list__right">
                <a class="link dropdown_list-item" href="./index.html">Add</a>
                <a class="link dropdown_list-item" href="./index.html">Remove</a>
            </span>
        </span>
    </div>
    <a class="link album_cover" href="./album.html">
        <img class="image album_cover-image" src="./images/album-1__all.jpg" alt="">
    </a>
    <a class="link album_title" href="./album.html">Matras</a>
    <a class="link album_artist" href="./artist.html">Link in Dark</a>
</div>

There are just 1 level wrapper .album, all elements are in. And there are:

  • Controls .album_control. You can have 2 controls: left side .album_control__left and right side .album_control__right.
  • Cover .album_cover. You should use square image.
  • Title .album_title.
  • Artist .album_artist.

If you want to list of albums wrap them in .albums-list class. And add .albums-list_item to each album.

AddRemove
MatrasLink in Dark

Album cover

This element is used separetly from albums you can see upper. But it can be used on album page or on others as decorative block.

all you need is wrap image with:

<div class="album-cover album-cover__disc">
    <img class="image image__fluid" src="./images/album-1__all.jpg">
</div>

Near to image will be created an pseudoelement which looks like vinil disc.

Image might be square. Because form of vinil disc is depends on image form.

Article

This wrapper is needed to output long text with headings. It containes text and headings rules. So you can use it when you have long text and raw output of user input, or if you dont wont to write .heading class everytime. To make heading you can just write [code.code <h1>...], and it will de ok.

<article class='article'>
    <h1>Hello world</h1>
    <p>Manuscripts don't burn</p>
</article>

Using tag article is not strict rule. You can use it in every reasonable situation.

We dont recomend to use it in unreasonable situations. Such as adding to body tag. You may breack other rules.

And of course you can easilly use simple heading block .heading in it.

Artist card

This section as the album has it's own class for block and for wrapper for list artists.

To output card all you need is the following code:

<a class="link artist-card" href="./artist.html" style="background-image:url(image);">
    <span class="heading artist-card_title">Maverik Bowee</span>
</a>

If you want to use list of artists, you can wrap it with .artist-cards-list and add .artist-cards-list_item to cards.

Maverik Bowee

Comments

This is how they output.

Torin Duboshit26/08/2019

Comments can be used separetly, but better is group. Like in example.

ReplyThumbs up
Vasya Vasutkin26/08/2019 
<div class="comment">
    <div class="comment_header">
        <span class="user">
            <span class="user_thumb" style="background-image:url(image)"></span>
            <span class="user_name">Vasya Vasutkin</span>
        </span>
        <small><em class="date">26/08/2019</em></small>
    </div>
    <div class="comment_body">
        <p class="text">Hi</p>
    </div>
    <div class="comment_actions">
        <a class="link" href="#">Reply</a>
        <a class="link" href="#">Thumbs up</a>
    </div>
</div>
ReplyThumbs up

Dropdown

Dropdown can be simple: icon, text or complex — block of user.

<span class="dropdown">
    <span class="dropdown_control">
        <span class="user">
            <span class="user_thumb" style="background-image:url(image)"></span>
            <span class="user_name">Vasya Vasutkin</span>
        </span>
        <i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-chevron-bottom"></i>
    </span>
    <span class="dropdown_list dropdown_list__right">
        <a class="link dropdown_list-item" href="./favorite.html">Favorite</a>
        <a class="link dropdown_list-item" href="./playlists.html">Playlists</a>
    </span>
</span>

Dropdown is built on tag span for it can be used in text tags like <h2>

Fields

There is no feedback provided. It means there are no classes with errors.

So you can use it with some scenarious:

  • One field for text\password\email or other in one row.
  • Form with checkboxes
  • Row forms

And with label\without and heler text.

Here are examples:

Default using 

<div class='field'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
    <input class='field_input' id='1'>
    <span class='field_helper'>Additional info. Can be an error</span>
</div>
Additional info. Can be an error

Textarea 

<div class='field'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
    <textarea class='field_input' id='1'></textarea>
</div>

Checkbox 

<div class='field field__row'>
    <input type='checkbox' class='field_input' id='1'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
</div>

Row 

<div class='field field__row'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
    <input type='text' class='field_input' id='1'>
</div>

Inline 

<div class='field field__inline'>
    <input type='checkbox' class='field_input' id='1'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
</div>
<div class='field field__inline'>
    <input type='checkbox' class='field_input' id='1'>
    <label class='field_label' for='1'>Hi</label>
</div>

Heading

All is very simple. Heading = heading. This is small block, that... No matter where you use it, with span\p tags or any other, even div.

Also you can make heading h5 looks like h1. Just adding the class .heading.heading__h1. But its native offsets will not changed.

Icons

In project are used icons set Rage.

Image

As default images styles are cleared to not create offsets. But using classes .image.image__fit and .image.image__fluid you can make them fit to its wrapper.

Link

Link as the heading not attached to tag, but depends on it attributes. It means you can add .link class to tag span and it will looks like link. But we dont recomen do such.

List

List is based on tags ol\ul and parent might have class .list, and doughters are .list_item.

Main nav switcher

This block contains the JS-instruction how to opan and close main nav on mobile resolition.

News

Для визуализации новости

To show news you can use this template.

<div class="news-item">
    <a class="link news-item_cover" href="./news-item.html" style="background-image:url(image);"></a>
    <span class="news-item_date">25/05/2020</span>
    <a class="link news-item_title" href="#">A brief overview of new products in music.</a>
    <div class="news-item_author">
        <span class="user">
            <span class="user_thumb" style="background-image:url(image)"></span>
            <span class="user_name">Torin Duboshit</span>
        </span>
    </div>
</div>
25/05/2020A brief overview of new products in music.
Torin Duboshit

Player

Player has hard structure:

Hello worldLink in Dark
2:55
<div class="player">
    <div class="player_track-cover" style="background-image:url(image"></div>
    <div class="player_controls margin__xx-2 align-items__center" hidden="">
        <span class="player_control">
            <i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-play-back"></i>
        </span>
        <span class="player_control player_control__play-pause">
            <i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-play"></i>
        </span>
        <span class="player_control"><i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-play-forward"></i></span>
    </div>
    <div class="player_meta">
        <span class="player_track-title">Hello world</span>
        <a class="link player_track-artist" href="#">Link in Dark</a>
    </div>
    <div class="player_duration">2:55</div>
    <div class="player_additional-controls margin__left-3" hidden="">
        <span class="player_control"><i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-mix"></i></span>
        <span class="player_control"><i class="icon rage rage-fw rage-loop"></i></span>
    </div>
</div>

Here you can find here full structure with icons. But some you can remove.

Pay attention. This player is for full screen use.

Tags

HelloWorldWhoWhereZZBottom

Can you imagine music without tags? No. So if you want use list of tags wrap them in .tags-list and add to tag class .tags-list_item.

But if you want them separately just add class .tag.

Track

The main build part of this template.

Track is not hard. Just cover, title and duration. Also you can add dropdowns.

<div class="track">
    <img class="image track_cover" src="./images/album-1__all.jpg" alt="">
    <div class="track_meta">
        <span class="track_title">Poster</span>
        <a class="link track_artist" href="./artist.html">Link in Dark</a>
    </div>
    <div class="track_adds">2:42</div>
</div>

If you use them without list add .margin__bottom-1.

PosterLink in Dark
2:42
Knock the floorLink in Dark
2:44
Go go gogogogoLink in Dark
2:58

Track have feature. It can rolls up. Just add .track__played to .track.

In any way better use you should use .tracks-list as wrapper for tracks. Add .tracks-list_item class to all tracks in list.

All tracks in list are numered.

Forewer oldLink in Dark
0:13
Dont GoLink in Dark
3:08
Somewere i beliveLink in Dark
3:34
Hello worldLink in Dark
2:55
Knock the floorLink in Dark
2:44

List have offset. Be carefull.

User

Image and name. This is all:

<span class="user">
    <span class="user_thumb" style="background-image:url(./images/user-thumb-2__player.gif)"></span>
    <span class="user_name">Torin Duboshit</span>
</span>
